hey guys I ran into a little problem when using the TWC throttle from Thurstmaster. I can only pull the throttle all the way up or down. If I put the physical throttle in middle possition, it tend to set the virtual throttle to 0% or 100%. I tried many different ways to fix the problem but the situation won't get better. Is it because Thrustmaster joystick does not fit with KSPor something

Thanks for your help huys :3

Hello, and welcome to the forums! 

Moving your post to Technical Support.
This kind of happens on my Logitech 3D extreme when in a rover. The throttle becomes more like the forward/back control and it's a bit tricky to stop the vehicle on the centre.
